item.title: Go Questions
item.description: array package main import ( "fmt" ) func main() { a := [5]int{1, 2, 3, 4, 5} t := a[3:4:4] fmt.Println(t[0]) } A. 3 B. 4 C. compilation error Answer B channel package main import ( "fmt" "time" ) func main() { ch := make(chan int, 1000) go func() { for i := 0; i < 10; i++ { ch <- i } }() go func() { for { a, ok := <-ch if !
